name: The Other Side (Zax37)
description:
Story

Worrying about a friend, who didn't show up at their appointment, Albert starts his magical journey, where, accompanied by his hologram assistant, Horendez, he'll learn long forgotten secrets of his lands, kept hidden by the nature.

Default Controls

WSAD - movement
Shift - run
Spacebar - jump
F - interactions
Mouse - move camera
Left mouse button - attack (when holding a weapon)
